voicelines.name: I was hoping for a challenge
I'd love to stay and chat

skins.name: Merciful
skins.description: Ana's biotic rifle uses a modified version of Mercy's healing technology, though the weapon was created against the doctor's wishes.

skins.name: Shrike
skins.description: Recently, Ana has operated under the alias of "Shrike" and is wanted for espionage, assault, and theft in Egypt.

skins.name: Captain Amari
skins.description: Captain Ana Amari was Strike Commander Morrison's second in command of Overwatch.

skins.name: Horus
skins.description: Ana's call sign was "Horus" when she served in the Egyptian military during the Omnic Crisis.

voicelines.name: It takes a woman to know

skins.name: Omnic Crisis
skins.description: During the Omnic Crisis, Bastion units fought against humans in battles around the world.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: Bastion units were reengineered and upgraded by Null Sector and deployed during the King's Row Uprising.

skins.name: Overgrown
skins.description: Damaged in one of the battles of the Omnic Crisis, this lone Bastion unit was reactivated in the Black Forest near Eichenwalde years later.

poses.name: R.I.P.
poses.description: Responsible for so many deaths during the Omnic Crisis, even today Bastion units are a symbol of fear.

skins.name: Taegeukgi
skins.description: During her time as a professional gamer, D.Va proudly represented her country in tournaments around the world.

skins.name: Junker
skins.description: Mech battles are one of the most popular forms of entertainment in Junkertown.

skins.name: Scavenger
skins.description: Mech battles are one of the most popular forms of entertainment in Junkertown.

skins.name: Bedouin
skins.description: After leaving Overwatch, Genji wandered the world, trying to come to peace with his cyborg body.

skins.name: Nomad
skins.description: After leaving Overwatch, Genji wandered the world, trying to come to peace with his cyborg body.

skins.name: Sparrow
skins.description: In his youth, Genji's father, Sojiro, gave him the diminutive nickname, "Sparrow."

skins.name: Young Genji
skins.description: The younger scion of the Shimada clan, Genji had little interest in carrying on the family's business, and spent his days on frivolous pursuits.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: After agreeing to aid the organization, Genji was upgraded extensively by Overwatch's cyberneticists.

voicelines.name: I was hoping for a challenge

skins.name: Young Hanzo
skins.description: Hanzo was the son of the former master of the Shimada clan. He had been groomed to take over leadership of the family as his father's successor.

skins.name: Young Master
skins.description: Hanzo was the son of the former master of the Shimada clan. He had been groomed to take over leadership of the family as his father's successor.

skins.name: Bleached
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Drowned
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Irradiated
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Rusted
skins.description: The destruction of the omnium in Australia and the formation of Junkertown made the Outback an even more dangerous place to live.

skins.name: Dr. Junkenstein
skins.description: As the tale goes, Dr. Junkenstein made a deal with the Witch of the Wilds in exchange for the secret to creating life. But his triumph was short lived as he was slain by four wanderers in Adlersbrunn.

skins.name: Auditiva
skins.description: Lúcio's latest album, Synaesthesia Auditiva, was a global hit.

skins.name: Synaesthesia
skins.description: Lúcio's latest album, Synaesthesia Auditiva, was a global hit.

skins.name: Andes
skins.description: When the weather gets cold, Lúcio heads to the Andes to hit the slopes.

skins.name: Seleção
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

skins.name: Striker
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

voicelines.name: I could do this all day
I'm on top of the world

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: A young Jesse McCree was recruited into Blackwatch after Gabriel Reyes saw his potential and gave him a choice: join Blackwatch, or rot in prison.

voicelines.name: Happens to the best of us

skins.name: Abominable
skins.description: Mei travels to remote regions around the world, investigating ecopoints abandoned since Overwatch was shut down.

skins.name: Yeti Hunter
skins.description: Mei travels to remote regions around the world, investigating ecopoints abandoned since Overwatch was shut down.

voicelines.name: You have to let it go

skins.name: Eidgenossin
skins.description: After finishing her education, including her MD and PhD in Switzerland, Angela Ziegler continued her research and served as head of surgery in a prominent hospital in her home country.

skins.name: Witch
skins.description: The Witch of the Wilds is a mysterious figure who appears in the tale of Dr. Junkenstein and others, offering people the object of their desire, for a price.

skins.name: Combat Medic Ziegler
skins.description: When called upon, Mercy would don her Valkyrie swift-response suit to participate in Overwatch missions.

voicelines.name: I have my eye on you

skins.name: OR15
skins.description: Originally built to protect Numbani, the OR15 defense bots were destroyed and decommissioned after a battle with Doomfist. A young Efi Oladele would purchase the parts of the bots to build Orisa.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: During the King's Row Uprising, Null Sector employed redesigned and upgraded OR14 Idina bots to secure the power station.

skins.name: Anubis
skins.description: Pharah was assigned to protect a secure Helix AI installation in Egypt at the Temple of Anubis. While the AI was briefly able to break containment, Pharah and her team were able to subdue it.

skins.name: Security Chief
skins.description: Following a sterling career in the Egyptian armed forces, Pharah joined Helix Security International as one of their chief officers.

voicelines.name: Sorry, but I need to jet

skins.name: Nevermore
skins.description: Quoth the raven, "Nevermore."

skins.name: Pumpkin
skins.description: In the tale of Dr. Junkenstein, the Reaper was a servant to the Witch of the Wilds, bound to serve her for some unknown reason.

skins.name: Blackwatch Reyes
skins.description: Gabriel Reyes was the leader of the original Overwatch strike team during the Omnic Crisis, and later commanded Blackwatch, the organization's covert ops division.

voicelines.name: If it lives, I can kill it

skins.name: Bundeswehr
skins.description: At a young age, Reinhardt Wilhelm enlisted in the German armed forces, seeking glory.

skins.name: Lieutenant Wilhelm
skins.description: Lieutenant Reinhardt Wilhelm served with distinction in his time during Overwatch, notably leading the strike team that ended the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Balderich
skins.description: During the Omnic Crisis, Balderich von Adler commanded the German Crusader unit until he was killed at the battle of Eichenwalde.

skins.name: Greifhardt
skins.description: After the Battle of Eichenwalde, Balderich von Adler's armor remained undisturbed for many years.

skins.name: Junkenstein's Monster
skins.description: Armed with the secret of creating artificial life, Dr. Jamison Junkestein birthed a monster.

voicelines.name: Life is pain, so is death

skins.name: Commando: 76
skins.description: At his first opportunity, a young Jack Morrison enlisted in the American armed forces to defend his country, serving with distinction during the Omnic Crisis.

skins.name: Night Ops: 76
skins.description: At his first opportunity, a young Jack Morrison enlisted in the American armed forces to defend his country, serving with distinction during the Omnic Crisis.

skins.name: Strike Commander Morrison
skins.description: After the Omnic Crisis, Jack Morrison was promoted to Strike Commander of Overwatch, leading the organization for decades until it was disbanded.

skins.name: Azúcar
skins.description: Orphaned after the Omnic Crisis, a young Sombra found a willing buyer for her hacking ability in Los Muertos.

skins.name: Los Muertos
skins.description: Orphaned after the Omnic Crisis, a young Sombra found a willing buyer for her hacking ability in Los Muertos.

voicelines.name: Did you mean to do that?
I'd love to stay and chat

skins.name: Utopaea
skins.description: Designed by its most talented Architechs, Utopaea is the jewel of the Vishkar Corporation's developments around the world.

skins.name: Architech
skins.description: Noticed at a young age for her potential in the area of hard-light engineering, Satya Vaswani was placed in the Vishkar Corporation's academy to become a future architech.

skins.name: Vishkar
skins.description: As one of the Vishkar Corporation's most talented architechs, Symmetra was dispatched to Rio de Janeiro to oversee their new development efforts.

skins.name: Chief Engineer Lindholm
skins.description: For many years, Torbjörn Lindholm served as Overwatch's chief engineer, designing many of the organization's iconic weapons and technologies.

voicelines.name: A chicken out of a feather
I'm giving it all I've got!

skins.name: Cadet Oxton
skins.description: Tracer was put into active duty as an Overwatch agent for the first time during the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Slipstream
skins.description: Before becoming an active agent of Overwatch, Tracer was a test pilot, until a mishap with the prototype Slipstream teleporting fighter.

skins.name: Odette
skins.description: For much of her life, Amélie Lacroix was better known as an accomplished ballet dancer in Paris.

skins.name: Odile
skins.description: For much of her life, Amélie Lacroix was better known as an accomplished ballet dancer in Paris.

skins.name: Horizon
skins.description: Most of Winston's formative years were spent as a test subject in the Horizon Lunar Colony.

voicelines.name: I do not want a banana

skins.name: Arctic
skins.description: After her retirement from competition, Zarya enlisted in the Russian defense forces and was deployed to the Krasnoyarsk front in Siberia.

skins.name: Siberian Front
skins.description: After her retirement from competition, Zarya enlisted in the Russian defense forces and was deployed to the Krasnoyarsk front in Siberia.

skins.name: Champion
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

skins.name: Weightlifter
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

voicelines.name: I can bench more than you
I dreamt I was a butterfly
